description: The Mondo Disease Ontology (Mondo) aims to harmonize disease definitions across the world.
name: Mondo Disease Ontology

resources.description:
The Monarch Initiative is an international consortium that leads key global standards and semantic data integration technologies. Monarch is made possible thanks to a diverse and dedicated team of biologists, scientists, and programmers from various schools and institutes:
University of North Carolina, University of Colorado, Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, Charite, The Jackson Laboratory, European Bioinformatics Institute, Queen Mary University of London, Johns Hopkins University, Consultants, C-Path, Renaissance Computing Institute, Scientific Advisory Board, Alumni Members, Alumni Groups

institution.description: The Monarch Initiative is an integrative data and analytic platform connecting phenotypes to genotypes across species, bridging basic and applied research with semantics-based analysis. We have created or currently contribute to many essential bio-ontologies that together enable sophisticated and semantically integrated computational analysis across gene, genotype, variant, disease, and phenotype data.
institution.name: Monarch Initiative

resources.name: Monarch Initiative
